com.textmagic.sms
Interface MessageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextMagicMessageService
public interface MessageService

MessageService is just a developer-friendly interface of TextMagicMessageService
Please, see TextMagicMessageService for full specification

Author:
Rafael Bagmanov
